segments.text: How do you usually sell your products now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm doing business through Internet now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , really ? Is it a good way ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is very convenient . You know you can browse the website and send e-mails to your customers at any time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , if we do business through other ways , it will cost a lot of time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Also it has low cost , and you know you only need to pay the fee of Internet , which is very cheap .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , going abroad to join the exhibition will cost much . But does it have any disadvantages ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: To be frank , sometimes it is not so safe as doing business through traditional ways .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You mean there may be credit problems ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , but if you choose some good B2B websites , such problems can be avoided .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course , such as the Alabama , which is a famous website .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks . Maybe I will do business through Internet in the future .
segments.speaker: S1
